name: RetrieveSetupIntentDetails
description:
Fetch details of an existing Stripe SetupIntent.

Use this tool to retrieve information about a specific SetupIntent created in Stripe. Requires the intent ID and optionally a client secret for client-side retrieval using a publishable key.

parameters.name: setup_intent_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the SetupIntent to be retrieved.

parameters.name: setup_intent_client_secret
parameters.description: The client secret for retrieving SetupIntent using a publishable key. Required for client-side retrieval.

value_schema.description: The client secret of the SetupIntent. We require this string if you use a publishable key to retrieve the SetupIntent.

parameters.name: fields_to_expand
parameters.description: A list of fields to expand in the response, such as nested objects. Each field should be specified as a string.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Stripe API.

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: The client secret of the SetupIntent. We require this string if you use a publishable key to retrieve the SetupIntent.

value_schema.description: The client secret of the SetupIntent. We require this string if you use a publishable key to retrieve the SetupIntent.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.
